tool_description: Retrieves and maps all requirements for a specific degree program including core courses, electives, credit minimums, and special requirements.

catalog_year.description: Academic catalog year in YYYY-YYYY format

concentration.description: Specific concentration or track within the program

minor_programs.description: Array of minor program codes if applicable

error_messages: Program not found: The specified program code does not exist in the catalog year.
Invalid catalog year: Catalog year must be in YYYY-YYYY format and represent a valid academic year.
Concentration not available: The specified concentration is not offered for this program.
Minor conflict: One or more specified minors conflict with the major program requirements.
Catalog data unavailable: Unable to retrieve program requirements for the specified catalog year.
usage: Provide the program code and catalog year to retrieve degree requirements. Optionally specify concentration and minor programs for comprehensive mapping.

program_title.description: Full name of the degree program

total_credits_required.description: Total credit hours required for graduation

core_requirements.description: Array of required core course codes

elective_categories.description: Categories of elective requirements with credit minimums
